dmca.title: Paidotribo Refuses to Sellout on its Copyrighted Books
dmca.body:
1. The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on: 
http://kinpndgcience.blogspot.com/ 
We found 15 Paidotrio books advertised in this site, there are links created to another web site which is a place to share documents and where you are able to download the material. 
We have contacted the person that uploaded the material and he has removed our books from the site. However, there are some publications from other colleagues publishers, such as 
Masson, Panamericana and McGrall-Hill 

2. These are some of the examples: 
Search Query: Google 
Infringing item URL: htto:llkineandscipnce blogspot.comI2flfl7/1 nfo-oostiaux-fisioterani? 
psoiratoria-en html 
Infringing item specific: Fisioterapia respiratoria en el nino 
Search Query: Google 
Infringing item URL: fittp;.jLkineandscipce.bIogspot.com/2pp7/p9/p-elmstrqm-manyaI_de_. 
fracturas.html 
Infringing item specific: Manual de Practuras 
Search Query: Google 
Infringing item URL: hLLp://kineandsrient-e hIopsoot.com/2D07/OS/farreras-rozmn_medieina- 
intema-1 3ed.hl. il 
Infringing item specific: Medicina Interna 
Search Query: Google 
Infringing item URL: http://Icineandscience. blopspot.com/2007/OA/ai-kaoandii-fisiologia-articular- 
5-ed. html 
Infringing item specific: Fisiologia Articular 5 Edicion 
Search Query: Google 
Infringing item URL: hllp://kineandsrien? hloosoot.com/2007/08/r-miralles_biomecnica_clnica 
del,html 
Infringing item specific: Biomecanica clinica del aparato locomotor 
3. Mi Address: 
[private] 
[private] 
EDITORIAL PAIDOTRIBO 
www. Daidotribo.com 

4 This is the email address of the owner of the site:

[private]gmail.com 
Fax en..s. pop: [private] Editorial Paidotribo 18/10/07 15:30 P9: 3/3 

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. 
6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an 
exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
